opportunity.title: AI/ML Decision Support System for Defense Operations
opportunity.description: Seeking AI/ML solutions for real-time decision support, data governance, and workflow automation in defense operations. Requires machine learning models, predictive analytics, and cloud-native architecture.
opportunity.raw_text: The Department of Defense seeks innovative AI workflows and agent configuration capabilities to enhance decision support systems. Technical requirements include machine learning operations, data pipeline development, API development, and DevOps automation. Small business contractors welcome. Multi-year IDIQ contract potential with follow-on opportunities.

opportunity.title: Native Hawaiian Organization Data Governance Initiative
opportunity.description: Native Hawaiian Organization set-aside for data governance and management system development. Focus on secure data pipelines and infrastructure automation.
opportunity.raw_text: This opportunity is restricted to Native Hawaiian Organizations. Seeking expertise in data governance, cloud computing, and automation. Hawaii-based organizations strongly preferred. Technical stack should include AWS or Azure, data quality tools, and workflow orchestration.

opportunity.title: Machine Learning Operations for Space Data Analysis
opportunity.description: MLOps platform development for NASA space mission data analysis. Requires expertise in machine learning, data science, and cloud-native architecture.
opportunity.raw_text: NASA seeks contractor for MLOps platform supporting AI workflows and predictive analytics for space mission data. Technical requirements: machine learning operations, model training and deployment, data pipeline development, DevOps automation, and API development. Multi-year contract with prototype and production phases. Small business innovation encouraged.

opportunity.title: Cyberinfrastructure Modernization for Energy Data
opportunity.description: Modernize cyberinfrastructure for energy research data management. Focus on data governance, secure pipelines, and decision support systems.
opportunity.raw_text: DOE seeks cyberinfrastructure modernization including data governance frameworks, infrastructure automation, and secure data pipelines. Technical capabilities needed: cloud computing (AWS/Azure), data quality management, workflow automation, and agent configuration. IL2-IL3 security posture required. Prime contractor opportunity.

opportunity.title: AI-Powered Decision Automation for Naval Operations
opportunity.description: AI-powered decision automation system for naval operational support. Requires machine learning, decision support systems, and workflow orchestration.
opportunity.raw_text: Navy seeks AI workflows and decision support capabilities for operational planning. Key requirements: machine learning models, predictive analytics, agent configuration, workflow automation, and API development. IDIQ contract structure with R&D phase and production deployment. IL3-IL4 security clearance required. Small business prime contractor preferred.

opportunity.title: Healthcare Data Integration Platform
opportunity.description: Healthcare data integration and analytics platform development. Focus on data quality and interoperability.
opportunity.raw_text: HHS seeks data integration platform for healthcare analytics. Requirements include ETL pipelines, data quality management, and basic analytics. Some machine learning capabilities desired but not required. Cloud deployment preferred. Small business contractors welcome.

opportunity.title: Agricultural Data Management System
opportunity.description: Data management system for agricultural research programs. Moderate technical complexity with some automation requirements.
opportunity.raw_text: USDA needs data management platform for agricultural research data. Basic requirements: data storage, simple analytics, reporting dashboards. Some workflow automation desired. Cloud infrastructure (AWS preferred). Standard security requirements. Single-year contract with option years.

opportunity.title: Educational Technology Platform Development
opportunity.description: Educational technology platform with basic data analytics. Focus on user experience and accessibility.
opportunity.raw_text: Department of Education seeks ed-tech platform with student data management and basic analytics. Requirements: web application development, database design, simple reporting. Some data governance practices required. Cloud hosting acceptable. Small business grant opportunity.

opportunity.title: Veterans Affairs System Modernization
opportunity.description: Legacy system modernization with moderate automation. Cloud migration and API development required.
opportunity.raw_text: VA needs legacy system modernization including cloud migration, API development, and workflow improvements. Technical requirements: software development, system integration, basic automation. Data management capabilities helpful. IL2 security posture required.

opportunity.title: Environmental Data Platform
opportunity.description: Environmental monitoring data platform with analytics. Focus on data collection and visualization.
opportunity.raw_text: EPA seeks environmental data platform for monitoring program. Requirements: data collection APIs, data storage, analytics dashboards, and reporting. Some machine learning for predictive analytics desired. Cloud infrastructure. Data quality and governance practices required.

opportunity.title: Website Redesign and Content Management
opportunity.description: Website redesign project with basic content management. Limited technical scope.
opportunity.raw_text: GSA needs website redesign and CMS implementation. Basic requirements: responsive web design, content management system setup, basic SEO. No AI/ML requirements. Standard web development project. Single-year contract.

opportunity.title: Digital Arts Archive System
opportunity.description: Digital archive system for arts collections. Basic database and web portal.
opportunity.raw_text: NEA seeks digital archive platform for arts collection management. Requirements: database design, web portal, search functionality, basic metadata management. No advanced analytics or AI required. Cultural sector focus.

opportunity.title: Library Catalog System Upgrade
opportunity.description: Library catalog system modernization. Legacy system upgrade with standard database requirements.
opportunity.raw_text: Library of Congress needs catalog system upgrade. Requirements: database modernization, web interface, search optimization, cataloging tools. Traditional library system project. No AI/ML components. Standard IT modernization.

opportunity.title: National Parks Mobile Application
opportunity.description: Mobile application for national parks visitor information. Standard mobile app development.
opportunity.raw_text: NPS seeks mobile app for park visitor information. Requirements: iOS and Android apps, content management, offline functionality, maps integration. Consumer-facing application. No specialized technical requirements.

opportunity.title: Transit Information Display System
opportunity.description: Digital display system for transit information. Hardware integration and basic software.
opportunity.raw_text: DOT needs transit information display system. Requirements: display software, real-time data feeds, hardware integration, maintenance. Standard embedded systems project. Limited software development scope.

opportunity.title: 8(a) Program Management System
opportunity.description: 8(a) program management system development. REQUIRES 8(a) CERTIFICATION.
opportunity.raw_text: SBA seeks 8(a) certified contractor for program management system. This opportunity is restricted to 8(a) certified small businesses only. Must be 8(a) certified at time of proposal submission. Strong technical capabilities in software development required.

opportunity.title: HUBZone Community Development Platform
opportunity.description: Community development platform. HUBZone certification required.
opportunity.raw_text: HUD seeks HUBZone certified contractor for community development technology platform. Applicants must be HUBZone certified. Strong data management and software development capabilities needed. This is a HUBZone only opportunity.

opportunity.title: University Research Computing Infrastructure
opportunity.description: Research computing infrastructure for R1 universities. Academic institutions only.
opportunity.raw_text: NSF seeks R1 research university proposals for high-performance computing infrastructure. Eligibility restricted to accredited universities with R1 research status. For-profit contractors not eligible. Academic institution required.

opportunity.title: Construction Project Management Services
opportunity.description: Construction project management for infrastructure projects. Construction NAICS required.
opportunity.raw_text: USACE seeks construction project management services for infrastructure development. Requirements: construction management experience, engineering oversight, field supervision. NAICS 236220 or 237990 required. No IT/software development scope.

opportunity.title: Top Secret Intelligence System Development
opportunity.description: Intelligence system requiring TS/SCI clearance. IL6 security posture required.
opportunity.raw_text: DIA seeks contractor for intelligence analysis system. Requirements: TS/SCI facility clearance, IL6 security posture, all personnel must hold Top Secret clearance with SCI eligibility. High-side development environment. Award exceeds $3M minimum.
